content.question: In what ways do this medieval Florentine church and its plan show the influence of Early Christian architectural forms? In what ways do this church and plan show elements of the later medieval period?

frqParts.text: In what ways do this medieval Florentine church and its plan show the influence of Early Christian architectural forms? In what ways do this church and plan show elements of the later medieval period?

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
